contents.name: Blood Rain Bow
contents.obtained_by: Dropped by Wandering Eye Fish and Zombie Merman.
contents.notes: Converts arrows to blood rain.

contents.name: The Bee's Knees
contents.notes: Converts Wooden Arrows to bees.

contents.name: Hellwing Bow
contents.obtained_by: Found in Shadow Chests and Obsidian Lock Boxes.
contents.notes: Converts Wooden Arrows to flaming bats.Highly inaccurate.

contents.name: Flare Gun
contents.notes: Fires Flares and Blue Flares.

contents.name: Minishark
contents.notes: Extraordinarily low use time (8).

contents.name: Blowpipe
contents.obtained_by: Found in Chests on the surface or underground.
contents.notes: Fires Seeds and darts.

contents.name: Snowball Cannon
contents.obtained_by: Found in Frozen Chests, Frozen and Boreal Crates.
contents.notes: Fires Snowballs.

contents.name: Boomstick
contents.obtained_by: Found in Ivy Chests and Jungle and Bramble Crates.
contents.notes: Fires a spread of three to four bullets.

contents.name: Red Ryder
contents.obtained_by: Found in Presents, obtained during Christmas.

contents.name: Sandgun
contents.notes: Fires Sand.

contents.name: Musket
contents.obtained_by: Dropped by Shadow Orbs and found in Corrupt and Defiled Crates.

contents.name: The Undertaker
contents.obtained_by: Dropped by Crimson Hearts and found in Crimson and Hematic Crates.

contents.name: Star Cannon
contents.notes: Fires Fallen Stars.

contents.name: Blowgun
contents.notes: Fires Seeds and darts.

contents.name: Quad-Barrel Shotgun
contents.obtained_by: Purchased from the Arms Dealer in a Graveyard ( and after Skeletron is defeated). (35).
contents.notes: Fires a spread of six inaccurate bullets.

contents.name: Handgun
contents.obtained_by: Found in Locked Gold Chests and Golden Lock Boxes.

contents.name: Shuriken
contents.obtained_by: Purchased from the Merchant (15). Found in Pots and Chests.

contents.name: Rotten Egg
contents.obtained_by: Obtained from Goodie Bags during Halloween.
contents.notes: This is the one of two, the other being the Flymeal, player-wielded weapon in the game that can hurt NPCs without the Guide or Clothier Voodoo Doll.

contents.name: Throwing Knife
contents.obtained_by: Purchased from the Merchant during a Blood Moon (50). Found in Chests.

contents.name: Poisoned Knife
contents.notes: Has a 50% chance to inflict the Poisoned debuff on enemies.

contents.name: Beenade
contents.notes: Once it explodes, it releases bees that attack nearby enemies.

contents.name: Star Anise
contents.notes: An upgraded, seasonal version of the Shuriken.

contents.name: Spiky Ball
contents.obtained_by: Purchased from the Goblin Tinkerer (80). Dropped by Goblins.
contents.notes: Stays on the ground for a few seconds, dealing damage to enemies that touch it. Pierces indefinitely.

contents.name: Bone
contents.obtained_by: Dropped by Angry Bones, Dark Casters and Cursed Skulls.

contents.name: Molotov Cocktail
contents.notes: Inflicts the On Fire! debuff.

contents.name: Bone Javelin
contents.notes: Can stick to enemies, dealing additional damage for 15 seconds.

contents.name: Happy Grenade
contents.obtained_by: Dropped by the Party Girl and sold by her when in inventory (250).

contents.name: Grenade
contents.obtained_by: Purchased from the Demolitionist (75). Found in Pots (in Hardmode) and Chests.

contents.name: Ale Tosser
contents.notes: Requires and fires Ale, projectiles have a wide area of effect.

contents.name: Bone Glove
contents.notes: Old Chinese and tModLoader Legacy only. On the PC version, Console version, Mobile version, and tModLoader version, the Bone Glove is an accessory.Requires and fires Bones, projectiles bounce off the ground once.

contents.name: Paintball Gun
contents.notes: Does not require any ammunition.Fires a three-shot burst.

contents.name: Harpoon
contents.notes: Does not require any ammunition.

contents.name: Daedalus Stormbow
contents.notes: Rains arrows from the sky.

contents.name: Ice Bow
contents.notes: Converts arrows to very fast-moving Frost Arrows.

contents.name: Shadowflame Bow
contents.notes: Converts arrows to slow-moving Shadowflame Arrows.

contents.name: Marrow
contents.notes: Converts arrows to very fast-moving projectiles resembling Bone Arrows.

contents.name: Pulse Bow
contents.obtained_by: Purchased from the Traveling Merchant after the Mechanical bosses are defeated (45).
contents.notes: Converts arrows to very fast-moving, ricocheting bolts.

contents.name: Phantom Phoenix
contents.notes: Fires a large phoenix projectile every couple of shots.

contents.name: Tsunami
contents.notes: Fires a group of five arrows.

contents.name: Aerial Bane
contents.notes: Converts arrows to special projectiles that split into five upon hitting an enemy.

contents.name: Eventide
contents.notes: Converts Wooden Arrows to streams of rainbows.

contents.name: Phantasm
contents.notes: Fires a group of four arrows.Increases in fire rate and shoots additional projectiles when used continuously.

contents.name: Chlorophyte Shotbow
contents.notes: Fires a group of two to four arrows.

contents.name: Stake Launcher
contents.notes: Fires Stakes.

contents.name: Clockwork Assault Rifle
contents.notes: Fires a three-shot burst.

contents.name: Gatligator
contents.notes: Highly inaccurate.

contents.name: Shotgun
contents.notes: Fires a spread of three to five bullets.

contents.name: Onyx Blaster
contents.notes: Fires a spread of four bullets and a large explosive projectile.

contents.name: Coin Gun
contents.notes: Fires coins.

contents.name: Uzi
contents.notes: Converts Musket Balls and Silver/Tungsten Bullets to High Velocity Bullets.

contents.name: Dart Rifle
contents.notes: Fires darts.

contents.name: Dart Pistol
contents.notes: Fires darts.

contents.name: Super Star Shooter
contents.notes: Fires Fallen Stars.

contents.name: Megashark
contents.notes: Extraordinarily low use time (7).

contents.name: Flamethrower
contents.notes: Fires Gel.

contents.name: Venus Magnum
contents.notes: Converts Musket Balls and Silver/Tungsten Bullets to High Velocity Bullets.

contents.name: Tactical Shotgun
contents.notes: Fires a spread of six bullets.

contents.name: Sniper Rifle
contents.notes: Extraordinarily high base damage (185).Converts Musket Balls and Silver/Tungsten Bullets to High Velocity Bullets.

contents.name: Candy Corn Rifle
contents.notes: Fires Candy Corn.

contents.name: Chain Gun
contents.notes: Extraordinarily low use time (4).Highly inaccurate.

contents.name: Elf Melter
contents.notes: Fires Gel.

contents.name: Xenopopper
contents.notes: Fires four to five bubbles that pop and fire bullets after a short delay.

contents.name: S.D.M.G.
contents.notes: Extraordinarily low use time (5).

contents.name: Proximity Mine Launcher
contents.notes: Fires mines that remain dormant until stepped on.

contents.name: Nail Gun
contents.notes: Fires Nails.

contents.name: Jack 'O Lantern Launcher
contents.notes: Fires Explosive Jack 'O Lanterns.

contents.name: Snowman Cannon
contents.notes: Fires homing rockets.

contents.name: Stynger
contents.notes: Fires Stynger Bolts.

contents.name: Electrosphere Launcher
contents.notes: Creates stationary energy rings upon impact.

contents.name: Celebration
contents.obtained_by: Purchased from the Party Girl (80). Dropped by the Moon Lord.

contents.name: Toxikarp
contents.notes: Fires bubbles that inflict the Poisoned debuff.Does not require any ammunition.

contents.name: Piranha Gun
contents.obtained_by: Found in the Jungle Chest in the Dungeon.
contents.notes: Fires three mechanical piranhas that latch onto enemies and continuously deal damage.Does not require any ammunition.
